lead_paragraph: Notre Dame Coach Brian Kelly was among the mourners in suburban Chicago at the funeral of a student killed when a tower from which he was taping practice toppled over.
snippet: Notre Dame Coach Brian Kelly was among the mourners in suburban Chicago at the funeral of a student killed when a tower from which he was taping practice toppled over.

headline.main: Services Held for Notre Dame Student
headline.print_headline: Services Held For Notre Dame Student
